allow: Bash(powershell -Command "& {$excel = New-Object -ComObject Excel.Application; $wb = $excel.Workbooks.Open((Resolve-Path ''C:\Users\neauj\Desktop\EN COURS DE DEV\graphidesk\supabase\migrations\PROCESS_FRANCHISES_GRAPHISME_BAT.xlsx'').Path); $ws = $wb.Sheets.Item(1); $range = $ws.UsedRange; for($row = 1; $row -le $range.Rows.Count; $row++) { $line = @(); for($col = 1; $col -le $range.Columns.Count; $col++) { $line += $ws.Cells.Item($row, $col).Text }; $line -join '' | '' }; $excel.Quit()}")

Bash(powershell -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$excel = New-Object -ComObject Excel.Application; $excel.Visible = $false; $wb = $excel.Workbooks.Open(''C:\Users\neauj\Desktop\EN COURS DE DEV\graphidesk\supabase\migrations\PROCESS_FRANCHISES_GRAPHISME_BAT.xlsx''); $ws = $wb.Sheets.Item(1); $usedRange = $ws.UsedRange; $rowCount = $usedRange.Rows.Count; $colCount = $usedRange.Columns.Count; for($r = 1; $r -le $rowCount; $r++) { $cells = @(); for($c = 1; $c -le $colCount; $c++) { $cells += $ws.Cells.Item($r, $c).Text }; Write-Output ($cells -join ''|'') }; $wb.Close($false); $excel.Quit(); [System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal]::ReleaseComObject($excel) | Out-Null")
Bash(copy /Y "C:\Users\neauj\Desktop\EN COURS DE DEV\graphidesk\public\icon.ico" "C:\Users\neauj\Desktop\EN COURS DE DEV\graphidesk\src-tauri\icons\icon.ico")
